io.gearpump.streaming.dsl.partitioner

Class GroupByPartitioner<T,GROUP>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.gearpump.streaming.dsl.partitioner.GroupByPartitioner<T,GROUP>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.gearpump.partitioner.Partitioner, io.gearpump.partitioner.UnicastPartitioner, java.io.Serializable

    public class GroupByPartitioner<T,GROUP>
extends java.lang.Object
implements io.gearpump.partitioner.UnicastPartitioner
    Partition messages by applying group by function first.

    param: groupBy First apply message with groupBy function, then pick the hashCode of the output to do the partitioning. You must define hashCode() for output type of groupBy function.

    For example: case class People(name: String, gender: String)

    object Test{

    val groupBy: (People => String) = people => people.gender val partitioner = GroupByPartitioner(groupBy) }

    See Also:
